reviews.author: Jill
reviews.review: Monte is a great leader. Stellar firm. We appreciate good quality agents in the industry.

reviews.author: doug lewis
reviews.review: One of my coworkers used them when he recently purchased a home. His real estate agent was Jessi Border, and she was highly recommended.  I reached out to Jessi and we talked a bit about what I was looking for in a home.  Through the entire

reviews.author: Maureen Smeder
reviews.review: Vanessa and Mike are the best!  This is the 2nd time I have had the pleasure of their assistance in selling my property. I would definitely recommend them to friends and family. Vanessa was very prompt in keeping me informed and always available to answer my questions. Thanks for a smooth sale!

reviews.author: Kris Krmpotich
reviews.review: Simply the best company I have ever delt with. Mike and his team are ultra professional, quick to answer any calls and just kind people. The whole buying process was easy with them. I highly recommend Bellwether Real Estate.

reviews.author: Gil Isidoro
reviews.review: I have been working with Nicole Christie for the last few month, I couldn't ask a better realtor than she is. Nicole is always available to answer any questions, resolve any problems that I have been face with my lender, I don't want let

reviews.author: Andrea P
reviews.review: We came her because of Kristal Grimstead. She helped us purchase a home and the experience was the best. Kristal is very knowledgable, responsive, pro-active, and is such a pleasure to work with. Helped us with every detail and worked hard

reviews.author: Rachel Johnson
reviews.review: We have worked with expert real estate agents in the past, but we have never worked with a more responsive, intuitive, knowledgeable agent than Zackary Tyler, of Bellwether Real Estate. Zackary has an impressive sense of the market, even

reviews.author: Zach Girod
reviews.review: Chris and Stacy are a wonderful team to work with. We were able to find the home in the neighborhood we wanted.

reviews.author: E.D H
reviews.review: Jordan is the best realtor I have worked with.  We have worked with several other agencies in town and Jordan by far surpasses all of them.  If you want someone who will always be available and will help with anything you need, he and Bellwether Real Estate is your answer!

ownerResponse.text: Erin - thank you for the awesome review! We agree, Jordan is a rockstar and the best of the best! We will be sure to pass this on to him.

reviews.author: blake Henney
reviews.review: Nathan butcher is the Goat realtor. It's no competition. From start to finish he was very upfront. Very professional and always answered any question. He goes above and beyond in every aspect.  Wouldn't work with anyone else ever again.

ownerResponse.text: Thank you for the review, Blake! Nathan Butcher is a rockstar and we are so lucky and grateful he is part of our team. Happy to hear you had such a great experience!  More

reviews.author: Tom Langei
reviews.review: Tami Kohonen was wonderful to work with.  Responsive, knowledgeable and quick to get things done.  Would highly recommend her to anyone!

reviews.author: Alexis Newmark
reviews.review: My front door says no soliciting. Skeezy business to ignore that sign and place this waste of paper on my step.

ownerResponse.text: Thanks for letting us know, Alex! We apologize that happened.

reviews.author: ! nwcartel
reviews.review: Great people to work with, very helpful and professional. They always seem to have time for you.

reviews.author: Michael Scott
reviews.review: Great people. Had coffee with a friend of mine who works there.

reviews.author: Robert Mitchell
reviews.review: Great people, very professional, results oriented.

ownerResponse.text:
Hi Lucky,
